pages.text: • Right-clicking a vanilla slime block with a shovel compresses it into a slime launchpad. Want to bounce even higher? Make an extreme slime plate. HASA, we have lift-off!$(p)• ATUM MEGA GOLD PLATINUM TIP (SUBSCRIBERS ONLY): Wearing Atum armor will make it easier to see through the sand fog! A little!

• Hermit Hint #248: Crab Rave… sure it’s a meme, but what if it were literal? Word on the street is certain crustaceans break out the glow sticks if you play them the right song. $(o)Hint: crab meat on a feline record?$()$(p)• Two words: Swan. Boat.
